Class BatteriesSimulationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e2.equipments.batteries.mil.BatteriesSimulationConfiguration

  • public abstract class BatteriesSimulationConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    The interface BatteriesSimulationConfigurationI defines configuration parameters for the batteries simulator.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       MeasurementUnit.AMPERES.equals(ElectricMeterImplementationI.POWER_UNIT)

 invariant       MeasurementUnit.WATT_HOURS.equals(BatteriesImplementationI.CAPACITY_UNIT)
 invariant       ElectricMeterImplementationI.TENSION_UNIT.equals(BatteriesImplementationI.TENSION_UNIT)
